name: Custom Post Count At A Glance
author: Prince Kumar

sections.description: This plugin helps you to see the post count for your custom post in the ‘At a glance’ widget in the WordPress dashboard. It also has a setting page where you can choose the post types for which you wish to show the count.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “Custom Post Count At A Glance”
  3. Install and Activate Custom Post Count At A Glance from your Plugins page
  4. Click on the new menu item “CPT Glance” under “Settings” and select the custom post to display count!

short_description: Display the count of custom posts in the WordPress dashboard in the 'At a glance' widget, like posts, pages and comment count.
